items.title: Buyers are gaining the upper hand in a shifting housing market. ‘Everybody wants a deal.’
items.description: A shift is happening during the busiest season for the real-estate industry.

items.title: My husband and I used joint funds to renovate and prepare his house for sale. Do I now own half?
items.description: “My name is not on the deed to that rental home, but we have been married 15 years.”

items.title: Advance Auto Parts’ stock rockets as tariffs didn’t change the earnings outlook
items.description: On Thursday, the company said it’ll handle the extra costs tied to the current tariff regime and still deliver its full-year earnings targets.

items.title: Surge in Treasury yields points to U.S. debt concerns as Trump’s tax bill advances. Investors want this fix.
items.description: There’s a list of things the White House could do to lower yields, but signing an executive order isn’t one of them, one portfolio manager said.

items.title: This investor banks on Munger’s advice to ride out volatility in markets and Tesla
items.description: Money manager Christopher Tsai says he pays scant attention to daily market ups and downs, except to look for stock opportunities.
